channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Vance slams Israel's parliament vote on West Bank annexation, calling it an 'insult'
item.description: Vice President Vance's scathing remark came as he wrapped up an Israel trip, as the Trump administration attempts to keep up momentum on the U.S.-brokered ceasefire between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Vance's scathing remark came as he wrapped up an Israel trip, as the Trump administration attempts to keep up momentum on the U.S.-brokered ceasefire between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.

(Image credit: Nathan Howard)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Court to rule on troop deployment. And, a new Pentagon press corps emerges
item.description: A court could rule on legal challenges surrounding the National Guard deployments in the coming days. And, a new policy for Pentagon reporters has led many to turn in their press passes.
item.content:encoded:
A court could rule on legal challenges surrounding the National Guard deployments in the coming days. And, a new policy for Pentagon reporters has led many to turn in their press passes.

(Image credit: Tasos Katopodis)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: This 'magical' dinosaur specimen emerged from the ground like a polished jewel
item.description: A new pachycephalosaur, officially named Zavacephale rinpoche, was described in the journal Nature. The word rinpoche is Tibetan for "precious one" and refers to the domed skull.
item.content:encoded:
A new pachycephalosaur, officially named Zavacephale rinpoche, was described in the journal Nature. The word rinpoche is Tibetan for "precious one" and refers to the domed skull.

(Image credit: Chinzorig Tsogtbaatar)
item.dc:creator: Ari Daniel

item.title: Your ballot or other mail may not get postmarked by USPS the day it's dropped off
item.description: Close to a deadline for mailing your ballot, tax return or legal document? To make sure it gets a postmark on time under the latest USPS changes, you may want to send it early or visit a post office.
item.content:encoded:
Close to a deadline for mailing your ballot, tax return or legal document? To make sure it gets a postmark on time under the latest USPS changes, you may want to send it early or visit a post office.

(Image credit: Mario Tama)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: What Jared Kushner brings to the negotiating table in the Middle East
item.description: President Trump's son-in-law says his relationships in the Middle East helped him broker a deal between Hamas and Israel. But his business ties also present a potential conflict.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump's son-in-law says his relationships in the Middle East helped him broker a deal between Hamas and Israel. But his business ties also present a potential conflict.

(Image credit: Nathan Howard)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: Starter homes are scarce. But homebuyers can improve their odds
item.description: For decades, construction of smaller, entry-level homes has been has been falling. But there are ways to find an affordable first home, and the changing market may help.
item.content:encoded:
For decades, construction of smaller, entry-level homes has been has been falling. But there are ways to find an affordable first home, and the changing market may help.

(Image credit: Matt Rourke)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: Antidepressant side effects differ greatly depending on the drug, study finds
item.description: Millions of Americans take antidepressants. And like all medication they come with side effects. Researchers studied 30 different antidepressants and found side effects vary from drug to drug.
item.content:encoded:
Millions of Americans take antidepressants. And like all medication they come with side effects. Researchers studied 30 different antidepressants and found side effects vary from drug to drug.

(Image credit: Guido Mieth)
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: Sports ticket prices are getting more expensive — and pricing out many fans
item.description: For sports fans, there's nothing as exciting as going to see your team play. But what was once an affordable form of entertainment is becoming increasingly more expensive and pricing some loyal fans out.
item.content:encoded:
For sports fans, there's nothing as exciting as going to see your team play. But what was once an affordable form of entertainment is becoming increasingly more expensive and pricing some loyal fans out.

(Image credit: Getty Images and via Bob Hinz)
item.dc:creator: Rafael Nam

item.title: Confused by the legal battles over troop deployments? Here's what to know
item.description: Two significant legal actions — including a possible decision from the U.S. Supreme Court — are expected this week. While both would be preliminary, they could impact how courts weigh in on such cases going forward.
item.content:encoded:
Two significant legal actions — including a possible decision from the U.S. Supreme Court — are expected this week. While both would be preliminary, they could impact how courts weigh in on such cases going forward.

(Image credit: Scott Olson)
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: Trump levies new sanctions on Russian oil giants in a push to end Ukraine war
item.description: President Donald Trump's administration announced Wednesday new "massive sanctions" against Russia's oil industry that are aimed at bringing an end to Moscow's brutal war on Ukraine.
item.content:encoded:
President Donald Trump's administration announced Wednesday new "massive sanctions" against Russia's oil industry that are aimed at bringing an end to Moscow's brutal war on Ukraine.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
